synopsis.text: X-Buster is a music video celebrating the 25th anniversary of the popular Mega Man video game franchise. It is the official video for the song "X-Buster" from the album "ROCKMAN HOLIC ~The 25th Anniversary~" by Sound Holic. The high-energy track and video pay tribute to the beloved Blue Bomber through dynamic visuals and lyrics highlighting key characters, games, and moments from Mega Man's extensive history. With its infectious melodies and nostalgic imagery, X-Buster is sure to delight long-time fans hungry for a dose of 8-bit-inspired rock while potentially introducing new audiences to this legendary gaming icon.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
